participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys solitude, and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I helped design the game Starcraft. I've an allergy to water. I am a recluse. I'm a famous Twitch streamer. I am working on building a robot to be my body double.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Energetic and passionate, loves sports and animals, has a quirky side with a love for collecting.
participant_2.background: I won a gold medal in the 1992 Olympics. I love cats and have two cats. I have a hat collection of over 1000 hats. I have a weakness for vanilla ice cream. My favorite season is winter.
